cart

Interface ICart

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CartImpl

    public interface ICart
    The API definition of the cart component.
    Author:
    Nils Christian Ehmke

      Adds an item to the cart of the given user.

        username - The name of the user
        item - The item to add

        item - The item to remove

      • getCartItems

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getCartItems(java.lang.String username)
        Delivers a list of all items within the cart of the given user.
        Parameters:
        username - The name of the user
        Returns:
        An (unmodifiable) list of the user's cart items.
